extendedInfo.description: Is it possible to get important dates such as your parentâs birth days or best friendâs wedding, notified with photos, as pretty and fit just like instant Polaroid photos?Is there a smarter app that automatically remind you important days?Can you imagine an app that pops up to notify you few days before an important date?May be along with a little note to mention what you have decided to do?All the existing apps are just another calendar with marks but this one has all the functions above and even more!!======= Main Functions =======- decorate important dates and widgets with pictures  (Widgets like instant photos)- not just +/- dates, but months or even years - forecasts important dates and starts alarm you 3days ealier- provides various size of widget that you want  (1x1 / 1x2 / 1x3 / 2x1 / 2x2 / 2x3 / 3x1 / 3x2 / 3x3)- decorate the widget information as you want- able to write a little note to mention yourself what that D-day is- backup/restore/arrange the D-day list* Reminds important D-days such as your childâs baseball match, spouseâs birthday, final exams and never let you down by disappointing your friends
